column1: Local Foods////Get your lunch here every day. The garden sammie and the egg salad sandwiches are my favorite-- I can't speak about the meat sandwiches because I'm a vegetarian but I've heard good things. The seating is comfortable
column2: you're never sitting in the lap of the couple next to you. The genuine regard that the management and staff show towards customers is astounding. Just once
column3: a mistake to my order was made (it happens to even the best when busy) and they corrected it without any resistance
column5: or frustration-- something I can assure you is not common among restaurants these days.
